admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc: (Historic)Hydro,(Historic)Other power and energy conversion,(Historic)Distribution and transmission

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would support the
            Government's strategy of developing Turkey's
            indigenous energy resources and of bringing about greater
            involvement of the private sector in energy development.
            Financing would be provided for the 283.5 MW Sir Hydropower
            Station on the Ceyhan river; and transmission lines to
            connect the power station to the national grid.  The project
            would furthermore provide technical assistance and training.
